item.title: MySQL command
item.description: MySQL Monitor Setting mysql -u root -h <HOST> -P <PORT> <DATABASE_NAME> -p -A database 每一個 command 最後都要加 ; status; create database database_name; drop database database_name; show databases; show tables; use database_name; table create table table_name( column1 type1, column2 type2); create table table_name( column1 type1, column2 type2) charset=utf8; desc table_name; show create table <table_name> MySQL 8.0 Reference Manual :: 3.3.2 Creating a Table - MySQL
